nodes.bodyText: @ochaloup If the user does not provide a value for checkstyle.skip this defaults to false (at least it did when I tested it).
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -374,7 +374,7 @@
               <excludes>**/*$logger.java,**/*$bundle.java</excludes>
               <useFile/>
               <!-- checkstyle is set to be run on particular modules by disabling skip -->
-              <skip>true</skip>
+              <skip>${checkstyle.skip}</skip>

nodes.bodyText: Please, give me some points how I can reproduce the test failure you can see.

nodes.bodyText:

But good call about using the plugin property name (namely checkstyle.skip)
